alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 16 at 12:56PM MDT until June 18 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 10 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 497... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 497 Mojave Desert. * WINDS...South 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...7 to 12 percent with poor overnight recoveries Friday night. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions will occur. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
